name: Shifter's Dungeon
description:
An adventuring knight comes across a tower that is known to have treasure at the top, waiting to reward any daring explorer for reaching it. Unbeknownst to him, there's something weird going on with the tower's architecture...

Shifter's Dungeon is a 2D platformer but without control of the player. Rather you control the level itself! Pick up blocks and rearrange them to assist the brave knight!

[Arrow keys] or [LS] = Move cursor

[Z Key] or [Xbox A] or [PS X] = Pick up/Place block

[Enter Key] or [Start] = Start game
